archimate:Requirement.name: BC.2.1.6c: c) Recovery Point Objective (RPO), which specifies the maximum amount of information loss that the organisation is willing to accept following recovery (e.g. the amount of information that will need to be recreated or re-input)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
